site.title: AlgoRhythmics
site.description: AI innovation lab building NodeVoyage travel platform and Ideonautix productivity suite

hero.tagline: OS-native studio aligning NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and consulting into one calm constellation.
hero.subtitle: We choreograph explainable AI rituals, from travel companions to founder workspaces, with AAA-accessible glass shells.
hero.description: Every surface honours reduced-motion settings, signage-born craft, and WCAG AAA contrast so your team stays in control whether you're exploring NodeVoyage, assembling Ideonautix, or partnering through our consulting sprints.
pillars: Story-led OS windows frame NodeVoyage, Ideonautix, and consulting within shared Aurora Mist surfaces.
Think Faster. Ship Smarter. Motion, focus, and colour tokens default to reduced-motion and AAA ratios.
Explainable automation fuses signage hardware discipline with cloud delivery for trustworthy launches.

nodevoyage.copy: Travel companion with OS-inspired itineraries, offline reliability, and explainable suggestions.

ideonautix.copy: Founder OS with modular rituals, venture metrics, and transparent automation.

focus.title: Calm OS rituals across products
focus.description: We maintain one timing, colour, and accessibility system so travel teams, founders, and partners feel at home in every surface.
points: OS-window shells stay legible in light, dark, and high-contrast modes.
Reduced-motion fallbacks keep essential context visible when animations pause.
Signage R&D meets cloud delivery so automation remains explainable and accountable.

hero.brand_aria: AlgoRhythmics brand highlight in the hero heading

story.title: Our Story
story.reality_text: We orchestrate OS-native experiences that make travel planning and founder rituals calmer and more transparent.
story.mission_text: To deliver explainable, accessible AI platforms that keep humans in the loop across journeys, startups, and consulting engagements.
story.vision_text: A 2026 design language where frosted glass, grain, and motion support focus while NodeVoyage and Ideonautix share a single trustworthy operating system.

founders.title: Meet the Founders
founders.subtitle: Two makers connecting signage R&D with human-first AI

nikita.name: Nikita Jurtaevs
nikita.bio: Nikita Jurtaevs co-leads AlgoRhythmics as CEO, shaping brand storylines and guiding product direction for NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. He pairs studio building with Reclame Fabriek’s signage lab, translating tactile experimentation into launch-ready digital experiences.
nikita.current_position: Reclame Fabriek — steering LED neon, controller, coating, and 3D fabrication programs that inform our product standards.

slaff.name: Vjaceslavs "Slaff" Trosins
slaff.bio: Vjaceslavs “Slaff” Trosins co-leads as CTO, architecting the cloud stack, data flows, and AI integrations behind NodeVoyage and Ideonautix. His signage-controller engineering inside Reclame Fabriek’s innovation unit keeps our delivery resilient and explainable.
slaff.position: Reclame Fabriek — evolving controller hardware, LED systems, and production tooling that feed real-world requirements into our software.
slaff.philosophy: Systems thinking across hardware and software keeps our decisions pragmatic; we validate ideas on the shop floor and translate the best of them into human-first digital products.
achievements: Runs a Google Cloud–first platform stack with SvelteKit, Flutter, Fastify, Prisma/PostgreSQL, and realtime messaging.
Aligns signage-grade controllers and LED pipelines with accessible, explainable AI user journeys.
Leads funding sprints that underwrite NodeVoyage and Ideonautix while recruiting multi-disciplinary talent.
slaff.brand_intro: Worked with global brands on premium advertising display systems:
slaff.brand_context: Projects delivered through Reclame Fabriek (Daugavpils, LV), shared by both founders
slaff.algorhythmics_vision: Fuse signage discipline with cloud delivery so AlgoRhythmics ships trustworthy, installation-ready AI experiences.

ai_companion.name: Lumen
ai_companion.greeting: Hey there! I am Lumen, your AlgoRhythmics companion. Ask about our lab, products, or how we can partner on AI adventures.

suggestions.title: Explore our AI lab
suggestions.prompt: What makes AlgoRhythmics different from other AI agencies?

suggestions.title: NodeVoyage platform
suggestions.prompt: Tell me about the NodeVoyage travel platform.

suggestions.title: Ideonautix suite
suggestions.prompt: How can the Ideonautix productivity suite help teams?

suggestions.title: Improve my AI strategy
suggestions.prompt: How could we improve our AI initiative with AlgoRhythmics?

knowledgeBase.answer: AlgoRhythmics blends rigorous engineering with motion-inspired creativity. We operate as an innovation lab, shipping flagship products while mentoring partners so they inherit the same R&D mindset.

NodeVoyage is our intelligent travel experience platform. It uses graph-powered itineraries, dynamic storytelling, and adaptive agents to craft journeys that feel both personal and delightfully unexpected.

Ideonautix is a constellation of collaborative AI copilots built for knowledge teams. It orchestrates ideation sessions, decision intelligence, and ambient automation so focus stays on high-value thinking.
You can reach our consulting team through the contact page or by emailing hello@algorhythmics.com. We love scoping proofs of concept and long-term partnerships alike.

A good first step is a discovery sprint: we map your goals, audit existing data flows, and prototype a focused AI assist. From there we co-design experimentation loops so your team keeps improving after launch.

ai_companion.fallback: I'm still learning, but I can connect you with the team or share highlights about our products, lab culture, and services.
